package.description: Provides rich language support for JSON files.
package.json.colorDecorators.enable.deprecationM: The setting `json.colorDecorators.enable` has been deprecated in favor of `editor.colorDecorators`.
package.json.enableSchemaDownload.desc: When enabled, JSON schemas can be fetched from http and https locations.
package.json.format.keepLines.desc: Keep all existing new lines when formatting.
package.json.maxItemsComputed.desc: The maximum number of outline symbols and folding regions computed (limited for performance reasons).
package.json.maxItemsExceededInformation.desc: Show notification when exceeding the maximum number of outline symbols and folding regions.
package.json.schemas.desc: Associate schemas to JSON files in the current project.
package.json.schemas.fileMatch.desc: An array of file patterns to match against when resolving JSON files to schemas. `*` can be used as a wildcard. Exclusion patterns can also be defined and start with '!'. A file matches when there is at least one matching pattern and the last matching pattern is not an exclusion pattern.
package.json.schemas.fileMatch.item.desc: A file pattern that can contain '*' to match against when resolving JSON files to schemas.
package.json.schemas.schema.desc: The schema definition for the given URL. The schema only needs to be provided to avoid accesses to the schema URL.
package.json.schemas.url.desc: A URL to a schema or a relative path to a schema in the current directory
package.json.tracing.desc: Traces the communication between VS Code and the JSON language server.
